org.apache.hadoop.fs

Class FSTestWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FSTestWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FSWrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileContextTestWrapper, FileSystemTestWrapper

    public abstract class FSTestWrapper
extends Object
implements FSWrapper
    Abstraction of filesystem functionality with additional helper methods commonly used in tests. This allows generic tests to be written which apply to the two filesystem abstractions in Hadoop: FileSystem and FileContext.
